title: Sample Test Case Title
description: Brief description of what is being tested
preconditions: 1. User is logged in|2. Required data exists|3. System is configured
test_steps: 1. Navigate to page|2. Click button|3. Fill form|4. Submit
expected_result: 1. Form submits successfully|2. Data is saved|3. Success message appears
test_data: Test user: testuser@example.com|Test data: Sample input

title: Upload Single Image
preconditions: 1. User has valid image file|2. User has upload permission
test_steps: 1. Click upload button|2. Select image file|3. Submit form
expected_result: 1. Image uploads successfully|2. Image appears in list|3. File is saved to server

title: Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify user can login with correct username and password
preconditions: 1. User account exists|2. Password is correct
test_steps: 1. Navigate to login page|2. Enter username|3. Enter password|4. Click Login
expected_result: 1. User is authenticated|2. Redirected to dashboard|3. Welcome message appears
